txt.en: Ashâmi or Raphûz is too injured to continue, you have failed
'I pray you are half the warriors as you are fools. This enemy is a true threat. Help me or stay out of my way.'
Assist Ashâmi and Raphûz to defeat the Alad
Wait for Ashâmi to finish speaking
Help Ashâmi overcome the Alad
'We survived. I will have an opportunity to speak with her now.'
Speak with Raphûz
You found Ashâmi, approach her with Raphûz
Wait for Ashâmi and Raphûz to stop their discussion
Raphûz is preparing for battle through the grove to find Ashâmi.
Assist and protect Raphûz as you search for Ashâmi
'Come, my friend, Shonith awaits.'
'Prepare yourself. We must use caution and haste as we search for Ashâmi. The reports I received about this dead land speak of fell and wrath-filled spirits. I will take the lead.'
'Come, daughter of Mashûli, pay the price for entering my grove!'
'Prepare yourself. We must use caution and haste as we search for Ashâmi. The reports I received about this dead land speak of fell and wrath-filled spirits. I will take the lead.'
Cautiously approach Ashâmi
Speak with Raphûz to begin the search for Ashâmi
Ashâmi, seeing Raphûz's reaction, offers a wry smile.
Raphûz asked you to accompany him to find Ashâmi. He wanted to apologize to the woman and to help her.
Assist Raphûz in his search for Ashâmi
'What do you intend to do with... that?'
Assist Ashâmi and Raphûz to defeat the Aladi
Help Raphûz find Ashâmi
Ashâmi is concerned you and Raphûz are over-matched in the fallen grove. She warns that the Alad is a powerful creature and suggests you may not survive this attack.
Wait for Raphûz and Ashâmi to finish speaking
Ashâmi scowls.\n\n'I pray you are half the warriors as you are fools. This enemy is a true threat. Help me or stay out of my way.'
Defeat the Alad of Er-atûr
Assist and protect Raphûz as you search for Ashâmi
Allow Ashâmi and Raphûz to finish their discussion
Ashâmi begins the grisly business of collecting a trophy from the Alad. Raphûz shifts nervously.
'Come, my friend, Shonith awaits.'
Raphûz is too injured to continue, you have failed
Raphûz is too injured to continue, you have failed
'Arise wrathful, and sup upon the living!'
'Prepare yourself. We must use caution and haste as we search for Ashâmi. The reports I received about this dead land speak of fell and wrath-filled spirits. I will take the lead.'
Ashâmi scowls.\n\n'I pray you are half the warriors as you are fools. This enemy is a true threat. Help me or stay out of my way.'
You have defeated the Alad
Ashâmi finishes her task and she and Raphûz move to speak to one another. Allow them to have their conversation.
Raphûz follows Ashâmi
Help Ashâmi and Raphûz overcome the Alad
You found Ashâmi
'Rise again, my wrathful spirits. Destroy these interlopers.'
Raphûz nods, acknowledging Ashâmi's statement.
You found Ashâmi
As Ashâmi begins to walk away, Raphûz looks at you excitedly and smiles. You should speak with him.
'You are both more capable than I expected.'
'My father's belief in the tales of Shagâna is profound. He believes my anger is because I am controlled by an Alad.'
Wait for Ashâmi and Raphûz to stop speaking
'I will send this head to my father, proving I am under no creature's control.'
Assist Ashâmi and Raphûz to defeat the Alad
'My decision is my own. My mind is my own.'
'You fools. Why did you follow me? This oasis is no place for Shagâni. Moreso for outsiders.'
'I will not return to him. I will not kneel like my sister to his will.'
Raphûz is too injured to continue, you have failed
'Be brief. The night is a dangerous time in this grove.'
'We will talk along the path to the Elven refuge of Shonith.'
Ashâmi, begrudgingly, accepts your assistance
'Was?'
'You know nothing of me.'
You and Raphûz discovered Ashâmai amongst a section of dead trees in the grove. She does not look happy to see you. Approach her and allow Raphûz to explain why you are here.
'There is no time for this childish nonsense. The Alad I seek is here.'
'All stories in Shagâna are rooted in truth. Prepare yourselves. Should you survive this battle, I will speak with you.'
You have defeated the Alad of Er-atûr
'I came only to apologize and tell you how you inspired me.'
Ashâmi begins to make her way toward Shonith
'Very well. I came to Shagâna to honour the memory of my father and restore his name.'
'There she is.'
'Our expedition into your lands means to prevent a common enemy from rising to greater power.'
'Come, [placeholder], and be careful. It is said the spirits here are filled with wrath.'
'My role, my job, was to catalogue and preserve the histories of your land.'
'Yes. Your independence inspired me to seek my own. I left my post to speak with you. To learn about you properly.'
'It is true. I know very little about you. I, however, want to learn more if you allow me.'
'The Aladi are real?'
Ashâmi was gravely injured and needed to retreat
Speak with Raphûz
Raphûz was gravely injured and needed to retreat
Ashâmi, begrudgingly, accepts your assistance
Ashâmi is too injured to continue, you have failed
Help Ashâmi and Raphûz overcome the Aladi
Speak with Raphûz to begin the search for Ashâmi
You approached Ashâmi in the ruined grove. Allow Raphûz and her to speak.
Ashâmi scowls.
You defeated the Aladi
'Rise again! Rise and bring them low!'
Instance: Voice on the Wind
